phrase: 0  The MSPN sents a dismissal to the MSPO .
2  The MSPO rejects the dismissal of the MSPN or The MSPO confirms the dismissal of the MSPN .

act id: error codes: missing activity = m, wrong order = w, ambiguous = a, else leave empty
The MSPN sents a dismissal to the MSPO.
The MSPO rejects the dismissal of the MSPN or The MSPO confirms the dismissal of the MSPN.
